title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1075/95 of 12 May 1995 determining the percentage of quantities covered by applications for advance fixing of refunds on eggs and poultrymeat which may be accepted and suspending advance fixing thereof
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1075/95 of 12  May 1995 determining the percentage of quantities covered by applications for advance fixing of  refunds on eggs and poultrymeat which may be accepted and suspending advance fixing thereof
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 15 May 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 May 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
